lemma ACLcommunicateNotWith_inverse_ACLcommunicateWith:
  "\<forall>v. UNIV - nP' v = set (nP v) \<Longrightarrow> SINVAR_ACLcommunicateWith.sinvar G nP \<longleftrightarrow> sinvar G nP'"
lemma succ_tran_empty: "(succ_tran \<lparr>nodes = nodes G, edges = {}\<rparr> v) = {}"
lemma unique_default_example: "succ_tran \<lparr>nodes = {vertex_1, vertex_2}, edges = {(vertex_1, vertex_2)}\<rparr> vertex_2 = {}"
translations:
lemma ACLcommunicateNotWith_inverse_ACLcommunicateWith:
  "\<forall>v. UNIV - nP' v = set (nP v) \<Longrightarrow> SINVAR_ACLcommunicateWith.sinvar G nP \<longleftrightarrow> sinvar G nP'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>v. UNIV - nP' v = set (nP v) \<Longrightarrow>
    SINVAR_ACLcommunicateWith.sinvar G nP = sinvar G nP'
by auto
lemma sinvar_mono: "SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.sinvar_mono sinvar"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.sinvar_mono sinvar
unfolding SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.sinvar_mono_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>nP N E' E.
       wf_graph \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> \<and>
       E' \<subseteq> E \<and>
       sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> nP \<longrightarrow>
       sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> nP
proof(clarify)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>nP N E' E.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>;
        E' \<subseteq> E;
        sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> nP
fix nP::"('v \<Rightarrow> 'v set)" and N E' E

proof (state)

       \<lbrakk>wf_graph \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>;
        E' \<subseteq> E;
        sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> nP

have g1: "\<And>v a. v \<in> N \<Longrightarrow> a \<in> (succ_tran \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> v) \<Longrightarrow> a \<notin> (nP v)"

lemma succ_tran_empty: "(succ_tran \<lparr>nodes = nodes G, edges = {}\<rparr> v) = {}"

interpretation SecurityInvariant_preliminaries
where sinvar = sinvar

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. SecurityInvariant_preliminaries sinvar
apply unfold_locales

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>G nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; \<not> sinvar G nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.set_offending_flows
                          sinvar G nP \<noteq>
                         {}
 2. \<And>N E E' nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>;
        E' \<subseteq> E;
        sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> nP
 3. \<And>G ff nP f'.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G;
        SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows sinvar ff G
         nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows
                          sinvar (ff \<union> f') G nP
apply(frule_tac finite_distinct_list[OF wf_graph.finiteE])

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>G nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; \<not> sinvar G nP;
        \<exists>xs. set xs = edges G \<and> distinct xs\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.set_offending_flows
                          sinvar G nP \<noteq>
                         {}
 2. \<And>N E E' nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>;
        E' \<subseteq> E;
        sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> nP
 3. \<And>G ff nP f'.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G;
        SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows sinvar ff G
         nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows
                          sinvar (ff \<union> f') G nP
apply(erule_tac exE)

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>G nP xs.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; \<not> sinvar G nP;
        set xs = edges G \<and> distinct xs\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.set_offending_flows
                          sinvar G nP \<noteq>
                         {}
 2. \<And>N E E' nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>;
        E' \<subseteq> E;
        sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> nP
 3. \<And>G ff nP f'.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G;
        SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows sinvar ff G
         nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows
                          sinvar (ff \<union> f') G nP
apply(rename_tac list_edges)

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>G nP list_edges.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; \<not> sinvar G nP;
        set list_edges = edges G \<and> distinct list_edges\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.set_offending_flows
                          sinvar G nP \<noteq>
                         {}
 2. \<And>N E E' nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>;
        E' \<subseteq> E;
        sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> nP
 3. \<And>G ff nP f'.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G;
        SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows sinvar ff G
         nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows
                          sinvar (ff \<union> f') G nP
apply(rule_tac ff="list_edges" in SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.mono_imp_set_offending_flows_not_empty[OF sinvar_mono])

proof (prove)
goal (6 subgoals):
 1. \<And>G nP list_edges.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; \<not> sinvar G nP;
        set list_edges = edges G \<and> distinct list_edges\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> wf_graph G
 2. \<And>G nP list_edges.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; \<not> sinvar G nP;
        set list_edges = edges G \<and> distinct list_edges\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows
                          sinvar (set list_edges) G nP
 3. \<And>G nP list_edges.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; \<not> sinvar G nP;
        set list_edges = edges G \<and> distinct list_edges\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> set list_edges \<subseteq> edges G
 4. \<And>G nP list_edges.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; \<not> sinvar G nP;
        set list_edges = edges G \<and> distinct list_edges\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> distinct list_edges
 5. \<And>N E E' nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>;
        E' \<subseteq> E;
        sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> nP
 6. \<And>G ff nP f'.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G;
        SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows sinvar ff G
         nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows
                          sinvar (ff \<union> f') G nP
apply(auto)[4]

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>G nP list_edges v a.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; v \<in> nodes G; a \<in> succ_tran G v;
        a \<in> nP v; set list_edges = edges G; distinct list_edges\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows
                          sinvar (edges G) G nP
 2. \<And>N E E' nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>;
        E' \<subseteq> E;
        sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> nP
 3. \<And>G ff nP f'.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G;
        SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows sinvar ff G
         nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows
                          sinvar (ff \<union> f') G nP
apply(auto simp add: SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows_def graph_ops succ_tran_empty)[1]

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>N E E' nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>;
        E' \<subseteq> E;
        sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> nP
 2. \<And>G ff nP f'.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G;
        SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows sinvar ff G
         nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows
                          sinvar (ff \<union> f') G nP
apply(fact SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.sinvar_mono_imp_sinvar_mono[OF sinvar_mono])

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>G ff nP f'.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G;
        SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows sinvar ff G
         nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows
                          sinvar (ff \<union> f') G nP
apply(fact SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.sinvar_mono_imp_is_offending_flows_mono[OF sinvar_mono])

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done
lemma unique_default_example: "succ_tran \<lparr>nodes = {vertex_1, vertex_2}, edges = {(vertex_1, vertex_2)}\<rparr> vertex_2 = {}"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. succ_tran
     \<lparr>nodes = {vertex_1, vertex_2},
        edges = {(vertex_1, vertex_2)}\<rparr>
     vertex_2 =
    {}
apply (simp add: succ_tran_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x. (vertex_2, x) \<notin> {(vertex_1, vertex_2)}\<^sup>+
by (metis Domain.DomainI Domain_empty Domain_insert distinct_vertices12 singleton_iff trancl_domain)

interpretation ACLnotCommunicateWith: SecurityInvariant_ACS
where default_node_properties = SINVAR_ACLnotCommunicateWith.default_node_properties
and sinvar = SINVAR_ACLnotCommunicateWith.sinvar

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. SecurityInvariant_ACS sinvar default_node_properties
unfolding SINVAR_ACLnotCommunicateWith.default_node_properties_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. SecurityInvariant_ACS sinvar UNIV
apply unfold_locales

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>G f nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G;
        f \<in> SINVAR_ACLnotCommunicateWith.set_offending_flows G
                 nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>i\<in>fst ` f.
                            \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := UNIV))
 2. \<And>otherbot.
       \<forall>G f nP i.
          wf_graph G \<and>
          f \<in> SINVAR_ACLnotCommunicateWith.set_offending_flows G
                   nP \<and>
          i \<in> fst ` f \<longrightarrow>
          \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := otherbot)) \<Longrightarrow>
       otherbot = UNIV
apply simp

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>G f nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G;
        f \<in> SINVAR_ACLnotCommunicateWith.set_offending_flows G
                 nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>i\<in>f.
                            \<exists>v\<in>nodes G.
                               (v = fst i \<longrightarrow>
                                (\<exists>a.
                                    a \<in> succ_tran G (fst i))) \<and>
                               (v \<noteq> fst i \<longrightarrow>
                                (\<exists>a\<in>succ_tran G v.
                                    a \<in> nP v))
 2. \<And>otherbot.
       \<forall>G f nP i.
          wf_graph G \<and>
          f \<in> SINVAR_ACLnotCommunicateWith.set_offending_flows G
                   nP \<and>
          i \<in> fst ` f \<longrightarrow>
          \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := otherbot)) \<Longrightarrow>
       otherbot = UNIV
apply(subst(asm) SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.set_offending_flows_simp, simp)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>G f nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G;
        f \<in> {F. F \<subseteq> edges G \<and>
                    (\<not> sinvar G nP \<and>
                     sinvar
                      \<lparr>nodes = nodes G, edges = edges G - F\<rparr>
                      nP) \<and>
                    (\<forall>(e1, e2)\<in>F.
                        \<not> sinvar
                                \<lparr>nodes = nodes G,
                                   edges =
                                     {(e1, e2)} \<union>
                                     (edges G - F)\<rparr>
                                nP)}\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>i\<in>f.
                            \<exists>v\<in>nodes G.
                               (v = fst i \<longrightarrow>
                                (\<exists>a.
                                    a \<in> succ_tran G (fst i))) \<and>
                               (v \<noteq> fst i \<longrightarrow>
                                (\<exists>a\<in>succ_tran G v.
                                    a \<in> nP v))
 2. \<And>otherbot.
       \<forall>G f nP i.
          wf_graph G \<and>
          f \<in> SINVAR_ACLnotCommunicateWith.set_offending_flows G
                   nP \<and>
          i \<in> fst ` f \<longrightarrow>
          \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := otherbot)) \<Longrightarrow>
       otherbot = UNIV
apply(clarsimp)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>G f nP a b v aa.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; (a, b) \<in> f; f \<subseteq> edges G;
        v \<in> nodes G; aa \<in> succ_tran G v; aa \<in> nP v;
        \<forall>v\<in>nodes G.
           \<forall>a\<in>succ_tran
                           \<lparr>nodes = nodes G,
                              edges = edges G - f\<rparr>
                           v.
              a \<notin> nP v;
        \<forall>x\<in>f.
           \<exists>v\<in>nodes G.
              \<exists>a\<in>succ_tran
                              \<lparr>nodes = nodes G,
                                 edges = insert x (edges G - f)\<rparr>
                              v.
                 a \<in> nP v\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>v\<in>nodes G.
                            (v = a \<longrightarrow>
                             (\<exists>aa. aa \<in> succ_tran G a)) \<and>
                            (v \<noteq> a \<longrightarrow>
                             (\<exists>a\<in>succ_tran G v. a \<in> nP v))
 2. \<And>otherbot.
       \<forall>G f nP i.
          wf_graph G \<and>
          f \<in> SINVAR_ACLnotCommunicateWith.set_offending_flows G
                   nP \<and>
          i \<in> fst ` f \<longrightarrow>
          \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := otherbot)) \<Longrightarrow>
       otherbot = UNIV
apply (metis)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>otherbot.
       \<forall>G f nP i.
          wf_graph G \<and>
          f \<in> SINVAR_ACLnotCommunicateWith.set_offending_flows G
                   nP \<and>
          i \<in> fst ` f \<longrightarrow>
          \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := otherbot)) \<Longrightarrow>
       otherbot = UNIV
apply(erule default_uniqueness_by_counterexample_ACS)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>otherbot.
       otherbot \<noteq> UNIV \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>G nP i f.
          wf_graph G \<and>
          \<not> sinvar G nP \<and>
          f \<in> SINVAR_ACLnotCommunicateWith.set_offending_flows G
                   nP \<and>
          sinvar (delete_edges G f) nP \<and>
          i \<in> fst ` f \<and> sinvar G (nP(i := otherbot))
apply(simp)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>otherbot.
       otherbot \<noteq> UNIV \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>G.
          wf_graph G \<and>
          (\<exists>nP.
              (\<exists>v\<in>nodes G.
                  \<exists>a\<in>succ_tran G v. a \<in> nP v) \<and>
              (\<exists>i f.
                  f \<in> SINVAR_ACLnotCommunicateWith.set_offending_flows G
                           nP \<and>
                  (\<forall>v\<in>nodes (delete_edges G f).
                      \<forall>a\<in>succ_tran (delete_edges G f) v.
                         a \<notin> nP v) \<and>
                  i \<in> fst ` f \<and>
                  (\<forall>v\<in>nodes G.
                      (v = i \<longrightarrow>
                       (\<forall>a\<in>succ_tran G i.
                           a \<notin> otherbot)) \<and>
                      (v \<noteq> i \<longrightarrow>
                       (\<forall>a\<in>succ_tran G v. a \<notin> nP v)))))

apply (simp add: SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.set_offending_flows_def
      SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows_min_set_def
      SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>otherbot.
       otherbot \<noteq> UNIV \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>G.
          wf_graph G \<and>
          (\<exists>nP.
              (\<exists>v\<in>nodes G.
                  \<exists>a\<in>succ_tran G v. a \<in> nP v) \<and>
              (\<exists>i f.
                  f \<subseteq> edges G \<and>
                  (\<exists>v\<in>nodes G.
                      \<exists>a\<in>succ_tran G v. a \<in> nP v) \<and>
                  (\<forall>v\<in>nodes (delete_edges G f).
                      \<forall>a\<in>succ_tran (delete_edges G f) v.
                         a \<notin> nP v) \<and>
                  (\<forall>(e1, e2)\<in>f.
                      \<exists>v\<in>nodes
(add_edge e1 e2 (delete_edges G f)).
                         \<exists>a\<in>succ_tran
   (add_edge e1 e2 (delete_edges G f)) v.
                            a \<in> nP v) \<and>
                  (\<forall>v\<in>nodes (delete_edges G f).
